reference: Abromovitz, Moses, Inventories and Business Cycles, National Bureau of Economic Research, 1950.

Bryson, Arthur E. and Yu-Chi Ho, Applied Optimal Control, revised edition, Hemisphere Publishing, Washington, D.C., 1975.

Caves, Richard E., J. Peter Jarrett and Michael K. Loucks, Competitive Con- ditions and the Firms Buffer Stocks: An Exploratory Analysis, The Review of Economics and Statistics, Vol. LXI, No. 4, November 1979, pp. 485-496.
Lovell, Michael, Manufacturers Inventories, Sales Expectations, and the Acceleration Principle, Econometrica, Vol. 29, July 1961, pp. 293-314.
